website_summaries.verdict: The Body Cardio provides a new way for measuring heart health, but it's not worth the time or money over a simpler connected scale.
pros: The Body Cardio can measure weight, BMI, body fat and body water percentage, bone mass, muscle mass, standing heart rate and arterial stiffness
Sleek design, long battery life, works on hard floors and carpets
cons: Its chief selling point is cryptic, and the "arterial stiffness" measurement doesn't always work

customer_reviews.title: No longer worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale in January 2017 and I have loved it, but then Nokia decided to pull one of the main selling features and frankly the reason I bought the device in January 2018. They decided all on their own to remove the PWV Pulse Wave Velocity from the scale. Very disappointing that a company can sell you something and then take it away without any compensation. This product no longer has anything that distinguishes it from other worthy products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usually works well
customer_reviews.text: My only complaints are that it occasionally can't figure out my heart rate (and gives up on it) and that I'm a little skeptical about some of the readings. When I first used it, my body fat was measured at 6% for a few readings and ever since it's always come up at < 3%. I'm thin, but I'm not an athlete, and I don't have an eating disorder either. My friend also uses my scale and his body fat currently measures around 25%. His measurement has been steadily falling over the past few months as he's been losing weight, so at least that part seems right. Seriously, though, 3% for me? Wouldn't I be dead?
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! Product arrived and didn't now work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Product arrived and didn't now work. Didn't turn on at all. Charged it overnight and still dead. Contacted Withings directly explaining the situation and never got a response back so have sent back to amazon for a refund. Lost confidence in this brand due to this experience so will be looking at other makes now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Withings Body Cardio for a few weeks. It was super easy to set up. It was easy to pair with my phone apps. The readings are matching that of my older scales that I replaced with the new Body Cardio. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Beware- Pulse Wave Velocity feature REMOVED
customer_reviews.text: Just received this scale in the mail. It is a uality built, connected to wi-if first time with no problems. Easy to add additional users. The current app is a bit... unorganized but useful (not flashy by any means, contrary to the way it looks in the pics). The biggest down fall from my perspective? Apparently Withings (now Nokia) decided to remove the “Pulse Wave Velocity” feature (also contrary to the advertisements) which, is the #1 reason I chose this scale over others. I am very disappointed about that. Otherwise, I would give this scale 5 stars at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Bugle

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this scale
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this scale, except the one thing I bought it for. Having weighed myself almost everyday for a week I have only got the Pulse Wave measurement once. The day I got it I did the 5 weigh-ins and got a measurement after about the 7th time. That was the last time I got it to measure it. I have tried all their tips to get it to work to no avail. I'm returning it and going to get their other body comp scale.
customer_reviews.author: C.Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive door stop since recent software update!
customer_reviews.text: This scale stopped syncing with the Healthmate app after the August 2017 "upgrade" of the app. Multiple attempts to reload the app and restart the scale are ineffective. Essentially the scale is now no more useful than many less expensive scales available. The scale battery life is about 4 weeks, then it takes about 12 hours to recharge. Other scales use replaceable batteries that last a year or more.
customer_reviews.author: A.Einstein

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea but Failed Execution.
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved my scale. With the WiFi link and the data upload to the web site I was really getting a handle on my weight. Then Nokia took down the web site a put a new one up. They really showed that they do not understand how your body works. They used to have long 3 month long trends plotted. Now all they have are 5 days which are about as useless as it gets. I am looking for a new solution and a new scale.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact I can use this scale on carpet ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I can use this scale on carpet and it automatically reports the data to my smartphone via a 3rd party app. It does have a couple annoyances like setting it up to begin with, so many extra display settings I don't care about, and of course the 3rd party app. I would probably give this 5 stars if I didn't have to use the Withings app and it imported everything directly into Google Fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: "Disposable" scale, broke after 1 year - customer service not much help
customer_reviews.text: This scale stopped working after 1 year. We contacted the company, who led us through a series of steps to reboot it. This did not work. After several failed attempts to reboot the scale, update the software, reset devices, etc., the company said they would give us a modest discount on another of their scales. No, thank you: I would really like them to fix this scale so I don't have to put it in the land fill and saddle the earth with a disposable piece of junk, let alone buy another of their pieces of junk to follow it to the land fill in a year!
customer_reviews.author: S. Noelle B.

customer_reviews.title: HARDWARE FAILURE, IS IS COMMON PROBLEM DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Well here is the issue, this product initially works great, but what happens is It will stop charging after some time. So I contacted the company and reviewed the forum's from the company's website what I found out was I was not the only one! So many others this is happened to, so the company offers this lame 25% a new one so if this has a hardware problem they will offer you to buy another one. It's ridiculous! Never would recommend this product as a Physician !
customer_reviews.author: Abdur Shakir

customer_reviews.title: It works but not how I would like it to
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time getting a heart rate reading. Also the app doesn't talk to the apple health app. Its basically just a bathroom scale that you can use to help track your weight over time. It works but not how I would like it to.
customer_reviews.author: SlowDive3030

customer_reviews.title: very nice one, the only problem is with the syncing ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice one, the only problem is with the syncing to iPhone ,, u have to open the app overtime you want it to sync after you do your measurements , sometimes you need to try twice to get the data , other than that works flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed  El Morr

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my routine! It was very easy to set up. I use it every day and night, and the app gives u great results. Very slick design and long battery life! The best part is the app though. It gives you results in graph and numerical form and I feel it really helps you see how you are doing day to day. Little notification like "congratulations you have reached a new low weight " or "congratulations you have completed today's goals" are the cherry on top and help you stay on target!
customer_reviews.author: Heepal Patel

customer_reviews.title: The single worst thing to happen to this scale is Nokia buying ...
customer_reviews.text: The single worst thing to happen to this scale is Nokia buying the company, and then immediately trashing the app. The hardware itself is perfection. The Withings app was, too. Lets see how bad Nokia gets this one wrong. There is a perfectly good reason they became a fire sale - and all indicators unfortunately point in the same direction. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: B. Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this scale. RUN AWAY. This product does not work with the app. The company offers NO consumer support nor will it honor its warranties. There are many scales out there. Don't waste your hard-earned money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Simply The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is a superior scale in all respects, e.g., accuracy, tracking and providing a continuous daily log, etc; however, the body composition statistics such as BMI, Muscle mass, water composition, fat mass, pulse wave velocity (cardiac health measurement), daily weather, hear beat measured and tracked dailey -- all combine to make this, IMHO, the best home scale available for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L. Richter

customer_reviews.title: Nokia Corporate Cheats on Rebates & support
customer_reviews.text: Data is trapped by Nokia and their updates are nearly useless. Nokia's attempt to continually up-sell and trap their customers is a misguided attempt at copying other products that work much better. Now, Nokia revoked the Pulse Wave feature, offered money back, and is now reneging. An Abomination of support & ethics!
customer_reviews.author: Vigneron John

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. When I first saw the product I thought it was a bit of an indulgence, but I love the fact that it automatically syncs with Apple Health. It is a great way to keep track of weight and overall health. I was so impressed with it, I bought their blood pressure monitor (which I also like a lot) and the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Konstantaras

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with is purchase. I was going back and forth between this and the fit bit scale. This scale it heavy and solid, which I think is a good thing. I like how after getting it all set up for both my wife and I. You only have to stand on it and it has no problem distinguishing between the two of us. Sends the data to the app and go on with your day.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best scale I've ever used. It is super helpful to track your helth and weight. If you are looking to lose weight, and stay healthy this is a very motivating and helpful tool
customer_reviews.author: Keasters

customer_reviews.title: Syncing weight is great, but extra body card features seldom work.
customer_reviews.text: As a scale, it is only moderately accurate, generally within a couple pounds of a calibrated scale's weight, but quite variable about whether it is high or low. More disappointing are the body cardio features, which seldom work. Instead of a reading, I just get a little x approximately 6/7 times. I've read the tips and am positioning my feet according to the instructions, but frankly it doesn't appear to matter.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. McRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale - But
customer_reviews.text: Great Scale - But... Nokia will disable the key feature of its priciest scale. The Pulse Wave Velocity tracking will be deactivated on January 24th, 2018.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy setup. Mass percentage fail.
customer_reviews.text: Wifi is seamless. Setup was easy. App works great. However the body fat and muscle mass percentage readings are useless. Don't get it for those reasons. Just get the version that measures your weight.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E Aronhalt

customer_reviews.title: I dont know the reason, but the scale was ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont know the reason, but the scale was crazy inaccurate. i stepped on it and read 210lbs then 1 sec later i put my foot on the same exact position and it reads 160lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amr T.

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS GREAT IT IS EVERYTHING IT SAYS IT IS
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS GREAT IT IS EVERYTHING IT SAYS IT IS. I LOVE IT. VERY ACCURATE AND TO GET ALL KINDS OF READINGS LIKE HEART RATE, FAT % ETC IN ONE MACHINE IS WONDERFUL. I TRULY LOVE THE FACT THAT IT SENDS THE RESULTS TO MY MOBILE DEVICE. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: JUCEUS LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice scale. Works great. Not sure I trust all the body composition data, but I'm sure it is as accurate as a consumer product can be, and certainly better than guessing. I'm still don't understand the ramifications of the pulse wave velocity, but the marker is improving with exercise, so it must mean something. It takes a while to get the pulse wave velocity number. I had to dampen my feet and steady myself with the wall after the weight registered. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MercerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it worked, died after 3 months, very difficult to get support
customer_reviews.text: Scale died after 3 months of use. Tried to call support but the lines seem to be busy all the time. Wrote an email and no response so far, not sure how long I still have to wait. This product is nice when it is working, unfortunately the product is not reliable and the company seems to be very difficult to get support.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: integrated easily with the house ecology and is a solid
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, integrated easily with the house ecology and is a solid, good looking piece of equipment. The only problem is that it's not showing that I've lost any weight. 4 out of 5 stars. OK, 5 out of 5...
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Collings

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only 9 months, Weight jumps all over the place (zero to nearly 400 lbs, sometimes sticks around 140 when nothing is on the scale). Also, Nokia recently removed the pulse wave velocity measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dentler

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced!
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK, but despite being rechargeable it died after a year and a half of use. The app sucks. I bought a cheap replacement a YUNMAI brand for a fraction of the cost and it doesn’t feel as luxury, but it’s durable and it works, plus the app is much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good scale - a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Great scale. Heart rate can be inaccurate at times (I know because my heart rate is not 49 :-) Like that Nokia has taken over & I think more improvements to come!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Roehl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Won't charge. Had this for a few months, one morning it was off and no matter what I can't get it to turn back on. I see this is a common complaint with this scale, I strongly suggest avoiding this scale.
customer_reviews.author: jakdracula

customer_reviews.title: Love my body cardio scale
customer_reviews.text: I've beeen using my body cardio scale for about a month now and I love it. It doesn't let me cheat on my weight logging. It was really easy to set up just followed the simple instructions and I was connected to my withings account and syncing to my phone in minutes. I still working on where exactly my feet need to be for exact balance but I'm sure I'll get there. When I'm out of balance the pulse rate velocity does not get logged but no. Iggie just need to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wish it had a plug for the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Hess Pen

customer_reviews.title: Best thing about this scale is that it automatically syncs ...
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about this scale is that it automatically syncs your weight so it just shows up on your phone. I don't really care about any of the other measurements, but it is cool to see trends in the graphs on the app. After first charge, haven't had to charge the battery yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scales to track weight progress!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a great many scales, Withings is the best one! I am loving the way it tracks my weight, my pulse, and the way it tracks my steps. I can track my sleep! It tells me when I have met certain goals!!!! It way very easy to set-up and fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: mgier

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of box
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Father's Day gift and it was defective out of the box. The readings would not sync to the app no matter what we have tried, rendering it a basic scale without the wireless features working. On the other hand, the wireless blood pressure monitor bought together works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Data and Insights are Invaluable
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this scale. The data trends and insights are invaluable to me.
customer_reviews.author: A Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Crap. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap. It doesn't work. It constantly disconnects, refuses to reconnect. I have reset it countless times. Now it isn't even recognized by bluetooth. You are wasting your money – that simple. You should not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ucvbn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. It does not ever determine a final wait but instead vacillates one tenth of a pound for multiple minutes on end. You can never get a final read and move onto the more advanced measurements and, as such, it does not sync with the app. Save yourself $140 and buy a $10 technology-free scale. You'll get the same info and save time each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Arancio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scale!
customer_reviews.text: What can I really say? It's not only an accurate scale but the other biometric features are amazing! Now, you can't expect this to be as accurate as professional tools but for the home user, it's a perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Best Scale!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding scale. I am so happy with this purchase. Looking forward to trying other products as well from Withings.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy BH

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 1/2 months, wont turn on anymore(yes ive try troubleshooting/charging it)
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Nokia has made Withings worse
customer_reviews.text: The scale is too unreliable for the price. It was so expensive and it just doesn't do what it claimed to be capable of doing. I wish I had never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Great modern product
customer_reviews.text: Great scale, lots of useful information transfers directly to my iPhone. Now if I could only make those numbers go down :)
customer_reviews.author: ALY

customer_reviews.title: I love using this and the app is great for seeing ...
customer_reviews.text: I love using this and the app is great for seeing trends and tracking your metrics but it’s difficult to get a consistent heart rate reading
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Withings Cardio has become a welcome part of the family's daily routine
customer_reviews.text: The family and I have really enjoyed our experiences with the Withings Cardio. The setup was easy and straight forward, taking maybe 15 minutes to get everyone up and running. The unit functions very well and I have no reason to doubt the claimed accuracy. The various analyses available from the Health Mate app have become a focal point as the family monitors its improving health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like the scale
customer_reviews.text: Really like the scale... the pulse wave measurement doesn't work well but everything else is nice and the quick update of the phone app is fun!
customer_reviews.author: M. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Bodyfat measurement malfunctioned after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about three months. Then out of nowhere, the bodyfat analysis function is clearly malfunctioned, although in a consistant way. For nearly three months, my bodyfat percentage was fairly consistantly measured at around 15%. Then about a week ago, my bodyfat percentage was measured at 8% and has been reading around that mark since. Every morning, as I did in the past, I measure myself and for the last week, my bodyfat is half (clearly not accurate as I'm not shredded) what is was previously. I'm past the one month return so now I will need to turn to Withings customer service to see if this can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: WSP

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale! Best price was amazon when I shopped ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Scale! Best price was amazon when I shopped around. I love that I can track weight, heart rate, etc on my phone with he app.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Best Of Breed
customer_reviews.text: I like this one a lot. While I know there is only a certain level of accuracy it can give, it's solid in its consistency and the trends certainly reflect the training (or lack of training) that I do over a period of time. As with any scale, measure around the same time of day if you want to see more consistent results.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: After about one year, the scale will no longer hold a charge for more than half a day. So basically useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works as advertised with great app integration
customer_reviews.text: Love it, does what it advertises very well. It takes a couple of tries to understand what the right way to stand is, but that's about it. Recognizes different people without mistakes, app integration works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, now I know my weight every day ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, now I know my weight every day on my app. Helps me understand when I'm gaining weight, helps me prevent it.
customer_reviews.author: jaime c.

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.text: This scale is terrible. The body fat percentage is at least 5% too high compared to the dr and gym's reading. My weight fluctuates up and down 5 pounds each day so it is constantly congratulating me about weight-loss I didn't actually achieve. It displayed a "X" where my name should be and told me it didn't know who I was until the next day. I gave it one star because the setup was really easy and it is very pretty. It got an additional star because it surprised me with the weather report, the only thing it does consistently every weigh-in.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyStuffs

customer_reviews.title: Great scale, connects well!
customer_reviews.text: Works quickly, looks great, connects to other apps, and is rechargeable! Got this as a daily deal, and very happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: but it seems to be pretty accurate and gives a consistent reading for tracking weight ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all of the features yet, but it seems to be pretty accurate and gives a consistent reading for tracking weight loss/gain.
customer_reviews.author: J Owens

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the scale overall, though the Fat % was all over the board.. Then it broke within the first 6 months, and I don't mean like it got dropped, it just stopped working. I would expect more longevity from such an expensive scale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best scale I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best scale I’ve ever owned. I’m a little bummed they’ve removed the wave velocity feature from the scale but it will still get 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Lehman

customer_reviews.title: with the trending aspect but don't feel that it is as accurate as one would like it to be
customer_reviews.text: I'm o.k. with the trending aspect but don't feel that it is as accurate as one would like it to be. Certain values should not vary as much as the readings on this device.
customer_reviews.author: oaf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: First two uses my weight seemed to be way off but it settled down and seems more realistic. Easy to use and setup.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, as stated by other the pulse wave velocity doesn't work consistently, however since that metrics isn't important to me it's inconsequential to me.
customer_reviews.author: slow

customer_reviews.title: but there are constant issues syncing with the app and the app is pretty bad by itself
customer_reviews.text: The readings are fairly consistent and seem accurate, but there are constant issues syncing with the app and the app is pretty bad by itself. I would say at least 20% of the readings do not sync. It is incredibly frustrating. How hard is it to make something connect in bluetooth these days?
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time...!
customer_reviews.text: you need one of these... you will watch your weight literally...!
customer_reviews.author: Bari Bari

customer_reviews.title: I tried to connect with Bluetooth but cannot. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried to connect with Bluetooth but cannot. I tried more than 20time so i thought it's my phone problem . But with another phone also same .so i push the link to the 'IF YOU CANNOT CONNECT ' section but even this link wasn't work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed was expecting more for the amount of money I
customer_reviews.text: Wish it would sync to my fitbit. Doesn't always sync to app either takes several tries not sure it is worth the price I paid. Disappointed was expecting more for the amount of money I paid
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Turner

customer_reviews.title: Best scale ever
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic! Connects to the wifi and off you go! I love the whole ecosystem
customer_reviews.author: 3eef

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic body metrics
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic body metrics - I really like the app and tracking features.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz Cerazy

customer_reviews.title: Good quailty and comprehensive information to monitor my health status
customer_reviews.text: Good quailty and comprehensive information to monitor my health status. But the wifi connection is so weak that I need to move it near my router whenever I want to read my data vis apps.
customer_reviews.author: Lui Kwok Kuen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This scale is amazing and easy to use. My family love it!
customer_reviews.author: C.T.A.

customer_reviews.title: I love the product but i dont know about the accuracy ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but i dont know about the accuracy of the % of fat mass, water & muscle mass ... It seen kind of weird to me . I used it more as a guideline than trust the %
customer_reviews.author: carmen rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale. I have it synced to my iPad and my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Best scale I ever had. I actually like getting weighed
customer_reviews.author: Howard Bliss

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This scale stopped working exactly one year after purchase and will not take a charge. For the price, I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: It's the tool I needed to stay healthy
customer_reviews.text: I love this- it helps me keep on track and stay motivated. It shows when I have been bad and good. Keeps me honest and regains my focus
customer_reviews.author: Corita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Its easy to use and gives you loads of useful information.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Grana

customer_reviews.title: Great scale and functionality
customer_reviews.text: The scale works as advertised. I love that the data goes directly to the Withings app without issue and relevant information is also available in other apps like Apple Health, MyFitnessPal, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Buy it. Love the simple setup and use. Very high quality, and app tracking is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dsn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: broke after one month and just past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not include USB cable as it should have based ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not include USB cable as it should have based on quick reference guide. There was no security seal on the box. I hope the scale works as advertised and is not a repurposed item.
customer_reviews.author: DrE

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent data. Weight fluctuates by 2. 5lbs on ...
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent data. Weight fluctuates by 2.5lbs on some days (It does this for all users on the same day, I know weight fluctuates) Pulse wave velocity jumps all around.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan L.

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful product, the wifi integration is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful product, the wifi integration is wonderful. BUT, if you buy this scale for the pulse or cardio health features you may end up as disappointed as I did. 90% of the time the scale reports a heart rate equal to half of my true pulse rate.... maybe it's because I have a very fast resting pulse (110), but the scale more often than not reports it as 60. I reached out to support and tried everything they recommended... the issue remains. Maybe it's just me? But just know that this very expensive scale is maybe not ready for prime-time.
customer_reviews.author: G. Twiss

customer_reviews.title: Best scale around.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best and most precise scales in the market and even though the cardio wave part is hit and miss, I believe is a plus to have for those of us who have a family history of heart problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to connect to WiFi, setup keeps failing, very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally enjoy the Withings Body Cardio scale
customer_reviews.text: Totally enjoy the Withings Body Cardio scale! The only bit of frustration is making sure to step in the correct area to the pulse wave to work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this scale the cardio part of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this scale the cardio part of the scale was turned off. why pay for something you don't get total scam
customer_reviews.author: dolphins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to measure "one more thing" heart health-related
customer_reviews.text: I already had the WS50 from Withings, so I was familiar with their accuracy for weight and body fat %... which are very good... but I upgraded to this product because of their new "pulse wave velocity" feature. It is great to see a different "angle" on my heart-related health. I have other devices that measure blood pressure, resting heart rate, and VO2 Max... but not artery stiffness. So far, I am very happy with this product's accuracy (meaning consistent with other angles on my health), and the BT speed to my mobile app is consistently very good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandan KenpoTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. I love how it works with app in my iPhone. All history saved and tracked in app automatically. But might be less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The scales came defective. Do not operate the sensor ...
customer_reviews.text: The scales came defective. Do not operate the sensor on the left side. Because of this, weight is not measured and other functions do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale, but don't buy this for accurate heart rate monitoring
customer_reviews.text: The scale is very sleek and good looking. Weight, body fat percentage, water, etc. are all on point, the app is very user friendly, and the scale was very easy to set up. The heart rate is so off the charts random that I either have a defective unit or need to see a cardiologist. The iPhone app actually keeps telling me to see a doctor. Well, I am a doctor and my resting pulse rate isn't 110 or 120. I think it even said 130 something once. No. It's like 75. That being said, it reads a normal HR sometimes, but rarely. DO NOT BUY THIS SCALE EXPECTING TO GET ACCURACY ON YOUR HEART RATE.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is Awesome. I will absolutely be buying more of their products to continue with keeping my Health monitored.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton E. McCray

customer_reviews.title: These guys did a great job. It is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Buy it. These guys did a great job. It is as advertised. Great Job Withings and thanks to Dr. Andreas Eenfeldt for the assist!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo D Mulinaro

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So far seems to be working really well. However, the body fat percentage is suspiciously low... really unsure if it's correct. When I emailed the company with a question, they were quick to respond.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Friendly apps. Not always able to pick up Pulse wave measurement but overall still good
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Koh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, tracking features are graphed using the app. Another nice feature is the ability to link to other fitness apps.
customer_reviews.author: Dale B. Manthei

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could think of... and MORE!
customer_reviews.text: The most comprehensive analysis available from a scale. I especially like the trend graph that appears right on the scale so that you can see if you have a few days in a row of gaining weight. That way you know if it was just a large meal last night or if you are on the path to getting fat! Current day's weather forecast on the scale so you know how to get dressed for the day! Heart rate. Pulse Wave Velocity. Fat Mass. Muscle Mass. Hydration. Step count for previous day. Part of a complete Withings ecosystem.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt B

customer_reviews.title: I love this scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale! It keeps me on track. I purchased this scale because of the heart feature. It highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joujoubonjour

customer_reviews.title: Hope yours works; Was Ok for 30 days
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month scale quits working. Called customer service, did the usual resets, etc. Want to return unit. They seem to have a problem allowing this to happen. Waiting for them to call back.
customer_reviews.author: MRCxxx59

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product overall but the fat percentage​ not accurate for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
